nchack.NCData.seasonal_max_climatology¶

NCData.seasonal_max_climatology(self, cores=1)¶

Calculate a seasonal maximum climatology

Parameters

  • = int (window) -- The size of the window for the calculation of the rolling sum

  • cores (int) -- Number of cores to use if files are processed in parallel. Defaults to non-parallel operation

Returns

Reduced tracker with the climatology

Return type

nchack.NCData
